content: Hi, currently I'm writing a documentation about Zulip, is there a reference to the latest official Zulip logo?
https://github.com/zulip/zulip/tree/master/static/images/logo folder has the latest Zulip logo
What are you writing about Zulip BTW? :)

Thanks @Cynthia Lin . I'm writing about the usage of Zulip in Wikimedia Outreachy programs especially how to use it, how to chat, etc (even though I'll mostly link the guide to Zulip help page, haha) , the requirement says that I need to assign a Zulip logo there, but I think the logo in Wikimedia Commons is pretty outdated, so I think I'll use the latest logo instead
By the way, of the options in the folder, this one is preferred: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/blob/master/static/images/logo/zulip-icon-512x512.png

@Brock Whittaker Do we have version of this which includes the "Zulip" text as well? I can imagine a logo like this to be more informative in pages like this and banners.
Screenshot-from-2017-12-06-01-12-02.png
Ah yeah, I was thinking in the space of logos. I can mock up something that has the text as well for something more official today.
@Brock Whittaker Did you ever finish your work on the branding guidelines? A press kit would be useful for future instances like this
